General.Name: Rainbow Rare Earths Limited
General.Description: Rainbow Rare Earths Limited engages in the mining and exploration of rare earth minerals. It explores for neodymium, dysprosium, terbium, and praseodymium deposits. The company primarily holds a 90% interest in the Gakara project covering an area of approximately 135 square kilometers located in Western Burundi. It also holds interest in the Phalaborwa project located in South Africa. Rainbow Rare Earths Limited was founded in 2011 and is based in Saint Peter Port, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Connaught House, Saint Peter Port, Guernsey, GY1 1GZ
